snippet: The judge said the trustee waited to intervene far too long after the New York attorney general first moved against a hedge fund manager who steered client money to Bernard Madoff.
abstract: Irving H Picard, trustee seeking money for victims of Bernard L Madoff's Ponzi scheme, is barred from blocked $410 million settlement resolving New York State's claims against hedge fund manager J Ezra Merkin, who was accused of secretly steering client money to Madoff.
lead_paragraph: The judge said the trustee waited to intervene far too long after the New York attorney general first moved against a hedge fund manager who steered client money to Bernard Madoff.

headline.seo: Trustee in Madoff Fraud Loses Ruling on Related New York State Settlement
headline.main: Trustee in Madoff Fraud Loses Court Ruling
headline.print_headline: Trustee in Madoff Fraud Loses Court Ruling
